replies.body: its almost like he wasnt a tank, but some sort of juggernaut.

That's been my concern for a while now. Tanks are too much of a threat.

Now, some may argue that of course a Tank would out damage infantry soldiers, but that's because real world Tanks are built for both defense AND offense. In a game where the iteams you build are both limited and focused, there's no reason for someone with 100% defensive build to do tons of damage.

On that note though, I guess it can be argued that of course tanks would be able to damage those that don't build defense. Looking at it that way, I can't be too upset. Full damage till I die!!!..a lot, and usually to Garen or Poppy.
